title: Public transport for Ladbrokes Manikato Stakes Day: Friday 21 October 2022
articleContent:
Public transport for Ladbrokes Manikato Stakes Day: Friday 21 October 2022

Extra public transport services are running for Ladbrokes Manikato Stakes Day on Friday 21 October 2022. 

Gates open: 5pm 

First race: 6:15pm

Last race 9:45pm  

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

No Additional services for Metro Trains

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from the Racecourse

Additional services along Route 59 tram, from 4pm to 11pm from Moonee Ponds Junction (Stop 33) to Flinders / Elizabeth Streets (Stop 1).

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
articleDescription: Public transport for Ladbrokes Manikato Stakes Day: Friday 21 October 2022
